detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DeFigemToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#4-136) has payable functions:
	 - DeFigemToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#35-37)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
